turns.content: I need a GDC-FLEX carbon housing 600x600 for 3000 mÂ³/h airflow. Indoor ventilation system.

For your indoor ventilation system requiring 3000 mÂ³/h airflow, we'll configure a GDC-FLEX carbon housing with 600x600mm dimensions. Since a single GDC-FLEX-600x600 module has a maximum airflow of 1750 mÂ³/h, this configuration requires two modules in parallel to meet your airflow demand.To finalize the configuration, I need to know the housing length required.Additionally, the requested 3000 airflow_m3h exceeds the recommended flow of 1750 for a single 600x600 module. 2 parallel units are required. Alternatively, a single 1200x600 mm module can handle 3500 mÂ³/h.

clarification.why_needed: The housing length depends on the filter depth you intend to use.
clarification.question: Which housing length is required?

content_segments.text: For your indoor ventilation system requiring 3000 mÂ³/h airflow, we'll configure a GDC-FLEX carbon housing with 600x600mm dimensions. Since a single GDC-FLEX-600x600 module has a maximum airflow of 1750 mÂ³/h, this configuration requires two modules in parallel to meet your airflow demand.
To finalize the configuration, I need to know the housing length required.

Additionally, the requested 3000 airflow_m3h exceeds the recommended flow of 1750 for a single 600x600 module. 2 parallel units are required. Alternatively, a single 1200x600 mm module can handle 3500 mÂ³/h.
